      Copy of the first length char of init.
      Parameters:

    • parsePow

      private HashMap<Integer,String> parsePow()
      Parse the polynomial with the powers.
      Returns:
      an HashMap in which the keys are the power and the values are the coefficients of the polynomial.

    • readCoefficent

      public Complex readCoefficent(String coef)
      Parser a complex coefficient into a Complex.
      Parameters:
      coef - a coefficient of the polynomial to parse.
      Returns:
      a Complex representation of coef.

    • setHashMap

      private void setHashMap()
      Parse the polynomial and save the result in the coefficients attribute.

    • buildFunctionForExposant

      private UnaryOperator<Complex> buildFunctionForExposant(int n, UnaryOperator<Complex> func)
      Build a part of the final function.
      Parameters:
      n - power of the Complex.
      func - the function already build by recursive usage.
      Returns:
      a function that adds func with z to the power n with a coefficient.

    • toFunction

      public UnaryOperator<Complex> toFunction()
      Give the parsed function as an UnaryOperator.
      Returns:
      build the UnaryOperator that match the given polynomial to parse.

      private boolean isDigit(char c)
      Says if the given char is a digit.
      Parameters:
      c - a char.
      Returns:
